text: Hi everyone!
Today I'm gonna show you how to make a frugal and healthy meal on Tet holidays
Today I gonna show you how to make a frugal and healthy meal to celerate Tet
and introduce some fresh recipe ideas for our national new year holiday
The meal is not only easy to make but also healthy and we will of course use easy-to-find ingredients
The meal is not only easy to make but also healthy and we will of course use easy-to-find ingredients
so that you enjoy a peaceful and fresh holiday with your family
You will enjoy a peaceful and fresh holiday with your family
Bitter Melon Soup is a popular dish of Vietnamese meal on Tet holiday
The meaning of this dish is to wish all difficulties in life will be overcame
Instead of making soup, I'll use bitter melon to make a salad
Although it's a vegetarian dish, it's also very delicious.
The ingredients include bitter melon, carrot, some Vietnamese pickled leek,
some chilli, mint and coriander
To make vegetarian mock dried fish, you need 4 tubes tofu skin,
4 cubes fermented bean curd and 2 tbsp wheat flour
Some roasted peanuts to add crunchy texture
To make salad dressing, you'll need soy sauce, sugar and Knorr mushroom seasoning powder
Soak tofu skin in warm water to soften
Mash 4 cubes of fermented bean curd in a small bowl
Add 1 tsp sugar
Stir it well until you get a thick mixture like this
When the tofu skin is soften, drain
and use a towel to absorb the water
Spread the  paste on the tofu skin
and then deep-fry until golde brown
Remove from oil and drain
Then cut into strips
listen to that  crispy sound!
Remove bitter melon's seeds and thinly slice
Similarly with carrot, you also trim as flower shape and thinly slice
Mix bitter melon and carrot in a large bowl
Add some salt and toss well
The sauce includes 1 tsp soy sauce
1 tsp sugar
1 tsp Knorr mushroom seasoning
Mix well until dissolved
After salting 15 mins, there will much water released
This step makes bitter melon crunchier
Rinse well and drain
Put bitter melon and carrot in a mixing bowl
Then add dressing and  toss well
Add mint, fried tofu skin,
pickled small leek and roasted peanuts
This vegetarian dish looks so yummy!
Next, we will make Bean stew with coconut
Lima beans can be mostly found in spring and summer
It's a heathy ingredient which helps us decrease the cholesterol level
and reduce the risk of cancer
It also makes us full faster and hence eat less
I went to the market this morning and found some fresh lima beans
and another type of bean which looks quite cute
It's called Pinto bean
We will simmer them with coconut fresh, shiitake mushroom
coconut juice and other seasonings
The nutty flavor of bean, crunchy texture of coconut and juicy mushroom will make this dish very delicious
The nutty flavor of bean, crunchy texture of coconut and juicy mushroom will make this dish very delicious
First, cook the beans in boiling water with a little salt for 15 mins until soft
Dice the coconut fresh
I use both young and old coconut flesh to give more textures to this dish
Finely mince some leek
julienne some ginger
With shiitake mushroom, remove the root and cut into a half or a quarter depending on mushroom size
fry the leek until fragrant and add shiitake mushroom
Stir well and add 1 tbsp soy sauce
Stir well and add 1 tbsp soy sauce
Add the cooked beans and coconut fresh
add some julienned ginger and mashed fermented bean curd
Simmer under low heat for 5-10 mintues
until the beans absorb the coconut milk and the sauce turns thick
I will use of the remaining half of the coconut as a bowl
Sprinkle with some black seasame seeds
and our dish is done!
Tuna Soup with Pickled Bamboo Shoot is a delicious soup
You can serve as a soup or make it saltier  to serve with rice or vermicelli
The ingredients of this dish includes 4 slices tuna
1 tomato, garlic and some chilli
200g pickled bamboo shoot , salt and pepper, some fish sauce
cilantro and Knorr mushroom seasoning powder
Rinse and soak the tuna slices in salted water for 10-15 minutes
It's a trick to make tuna look bright after being cooked
Peel the garlic and mince finely
Cut tomato into wedges, then cut in half
Cut chilli in half or slices
Cut pickled bamboo shoot into bite-sized pieces
Fry garlic until golden brown
Add tomato and 1 tbsp of fish sauce
Mix  well
Add pickled bamboo shoot and 2 liters water.
Bring to a boil.
Season with some salt and sugar
When the water comes to a full boil, add  1 slice tuna
Wait for it to boil again and add the next slice
That helps reduce the fishy smell of tuna
Cook for about 10-15 mins
Finally, add 1 tsp of Knorr mushroom seasoning powder
Don't forget some chilli to reduce the smell of fish. Tranfer to a bowl and top with some cilantro
I decide to make this dish on Tet holiday's meal
because we can keep it in a fridge for few days
And warm up whenever we want to enjoy this dish
It would still taste good
And help us save our cooking time
Pickled bamboo shoot is good for digestion
Unlike fatty foods, this dish is very easy-to-digest without making the stomach heavy
Unlike fatty foods, this dish is very easy-to-digest without making the stomach heavy
Boiled bok choy is so easy to make, right?
But I'd like to give you a tip
to keep the green color of this vegetable when cooking
Add 1/2 tsp salt
Wait until the water comes to a full boil then add the veggies. This way the green color of boy chok is remained
Let make a good arrangement when putting on a plate
even those who don't like eating vegetables will get excited just by looking at it
How wonderful!
Let enjoy this fugal meal on Tet holiday with me!
I hope you will like this Tet holiday's meal that I made today
If you try these recipes, don't forget to take photos and share with me
Don't forget to click 'like' and share with your friends.
Happy new year!
